definition: A form of visual storytelling that involves creating moving images through a series of sequential drawings or computer-generated graphics. It is commonly used in the production of films, television shows, video games, and advertisements to bring characters and objects to life.

examples.german: Die Animation des Films war beeindruckend.
examples.english: The animation of the film was impressive.

examples.german: Er arbeitet als Animator in einer gro√üen Produktionsfirma.
examples.english: He works as an animator in a large production company.

examples.german: Die Animationen in diesem Videospiel sind sehr realistisch.
examples.english: The animations in this video game are very realistic.

examples.german: Sie hat eine Karriere in der Animation angestrebt.
examples.english: She pursued a career in animation.

examples.german: Die Animationen helfen den Zuschauern, die Geschichte besser zu verstehen.
examples.english: The animations help the viewers to better understand the story.
